CatDescriptText: Cutline for image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper November 3, 1956, pg. B4, reads: "'Ghosts and Goblins' - Neighborhood youngsters in the Shadyside area enjoyed playing the role of 'ghosts' and 'goblins' at a Halloween party given by Mr. and Mrs. Henry Gibson and Yvonne Wright of 730 Bellefonte St.  Candy for the 2 to 8-year-old 'ghosts' and 'goblins' was furnished by the Community Chest.  Needless to say, a good time was had by all. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Children wearing Halloween costumes and holding tin horns, including girl in center holding bowl of popcorn balls, for party in Gibson or Wright home, 730 Bellefonte Street, Shadyside
